job_history.work_description: AML/CFT; International Sanctions Compliance; Sanctions lists management; The Bank Secrecy Act; The USA PATRIOT Act; US Treasury AML guidelines; OFAC requirements; Suspicious Activity Reporting requirements; KYC/EDD/PEPs procedures; AML Risk Assessment; Processing/Analytics/Investigations of AML/CFT/KYC/Sanctions screening alerts; Surveillance, account monitoring and investigating High-risk accounts and their transactions.

job_history.role_name: Senior Specialist at International Payments Department
job_history.work_description: Working in SWIFT system; Processing and authorizing the customers' payment orders through SWIFT system; Payment investigations; Surveillance, account monitoring and investigating High-risk accounts and their transactions; Relationship management authorization (RMA) processing with foreign financial institutions; Processing and authorizing the customers' payment orders through BISS; Processing and authorizing treasury deals, Letters of credit (L/C), trade-financial operations, foreign exchange transactions, interbank deals.

job_history.role_name: Loan Specialist at Retail Banking and Loan Department
job_history.work_description: Consulting customers on the banking products, loans; Customers attracting, detection of client needs; Carrying on negotiations with customers, promotion of bank services; Selling of additional services and products; Undertaking due diligence in relation to clients; Analysis and assessment of the customer's creditworthiness.

job_history.role_name: Personal Banker/Teller at Retail Banking Department
job_history.work_description: Internship and externship; Consulting customers on the banking products; Customers attracting; Carrying on negotiations with customers, promotion of bank services; Selling of additional services and products; Processing short-term and long-term deposits; Cashier transactions services, withdrawals; Recording of money movements in the bank database.

education.university: Minsk State College of Services Industry
